entry.def: The Mafia is a criminal organization that makes money illegally, especially by threatening people and dealing in drugs.

example.ex: The Mafia is by no means ignored by Italian television.
example.tran: 意大利电视台绝对不会放过对黑手党的关注。

entry.tran: 黑帮;势力集团;秘密犯罪团伙
entry.def: You can use mafia to refer to an organized group of people who you disapprove of because they use unfair or illegal means in order to get what they want.

example.ex: They are well-connected with the south-based education-reform mafia.
example.tran: 他们同以南方为大本营的教育改革势力集团有着密切的联系。

means.word_mean: 1. any tightly knit group of trusted associates

sentences.cn: 准备为当局作证的黑手党成员

sentences.en: He was snuffed out by the Mafia.
He swore to avenge himself on the mafia.
sentences.cn: 他发誓说要向黑手党报仇。

means.word_mean: 秘密犯罪集团,秘密施加巨大影响的一伙人

sentences.en: Contractors winning construction jobs had to kick back 2 per cent of the contract price to the mafia.
sentences.cn: 赢得建筑工作的承包商得抽出合同价格的百分之二的回扣给黑手党。
